document_data.name: Health Blessing
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell provided protection from ill health to [[human]]s as well as demihuman and [[humanoid]] species. The spell provided temporary immunity to mundane diseases and illnesses. It also provided protection from poisons and death-based magic. In addition, they could cast ''[[cure light wounds]]'' once per day on themselves and heal another creature once per day in a fashion similar to how a [[paladin]] provides healing.
document_data.Usage: The spell was available to [[cleric]]s of [[Karsus]].<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/104/Forgotten Deities: Karsus|4}}
